submodules.title: Idea Conversion
submodules.description: Utilizes natural language processing to transform vague project ideas into structured project blueprints, enabling teams to visualize and plan their development efforts effectively.

submodules.title: Interactive Brainstorming
submodules.description: Facilitates real-time discussions and brainstorming sessions, allowing team members to collaboratively refine ideas and generate actionable tasks.

submodules.title: Feedback Loop
submodules.description: Provides a mechanism for continuous feedback on project ideas and structures, ensuring that all stakeholders are aligned and informed throughout the development process.

submodules.title: Auto-Generated Repositories
submodules.description: Automatically creates GitHub repositories with predefined modules, tasks, and file structures, streamlining the setup process for new projects and ensuring consistency across teams.

submodules.title: Task Allocation
submodules.description: Distributes tasks among team members based on their skills and availability, optimizing resource utilization and enhancing productivity.

submodules.title: Module Specification
submodules.description: Allows users to define and customize project modules, ensuring that all necessary components are included in the project structure for a comprehensive development approach.

submodules.title: Budget Negotiation
submodules.description: Enables developers to request budgets for specific modules and tasks, facilitating transparent discussions about project costs and resource allocation.

submodules.title: Fund Release Mechanism
submodules.description: Links fund disbursement to task completion and GitHub commits, ensuring that payments are made only when milestones are achieved, promoting accountability and performance.

submodules.title: Budget Tracking
submodules.description: Provides tools for monitoring project expenses and budget adherence, allowing teams to make informed decisions and adjustments as needed throughout the project lifecycle.

submodules.title: Task Completion Monitoring
submodules.description: Tracks the status of tasks and modules in real-time, providing insights into project progress and identifying potential bottlenecks early in the development process.

submodules.title: Scope Change Management
submodules.description: Facilitates the management of scope changes by documenting alterations and their impacts on timelines and budgets, ensuring that all stakeholders are aware of adjustments.

submodules.title: AI-Driven Updates
submodules.description: Generates automated project updates based on progress and changes, keeping all team members informed and aligned without the need for manual reporting.

submodules.title: GitHub Integration
submodules.description: Seamlessly connects with GitHub to synchronize project tasks, commits, and repository management, enhancing collaboration and version control.

submodules.title: Celo Fund Streaming
submodules.description: Integrates with Celo to facilitate real-time fund streaming for project expenses, ensuring that financial transactions are efficient and transparent.

submodules.title: Self Protocol Verification
submodules.description: Utilizes Self Protocol to verify developer identities and contributions, fostering trust and accountability within the team and among stakeholders.

submodules.title: Hackathon Support
submodules.description: Provides tailored features for hackathon participants, enabling rapid project setup and collaboration among diverse teams in a competitive environment.

submodules.title: Freelance Client Management
submodules.description: Equips freelancers with tools to manage client projects effectively, from initial discussions to final delivery, ensuring clear communication and project alignment.

submodules.title: Open-Source Collaboration
submodules.description: Facilitates collaboration on open-source projects by providing a structured approach to project management, encouraging contributions from a global community of developers.
